description:
Everyone wants to know what kind of meat Hatabou is cooking, who`s the leader of the school, and Iyami teaches the sextuplets a thing or two about comedy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oshiete Hatabou / School Matsu / Iyami no Gakkou
Tell Us, Hatabou / School Matsu / Iyami`s School
教えてハタ坊 / スクール松 / イヤミの学校
